articles.content: Paracetamol has often been cited as a safer alternative to non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) with regards blood pressure and cardiovascular health. But now researchers have raised concer… [+5030 chars]

articles.author: Dr Sheena Meredith
articles.title: New Data Suggest There is a Low Risk of COVID on London Tube - Medscape
articles.description: A new computer modelling simulation suggests the risk of infection in the underground and similar settings is actually quite low.
articles.content: Packed commuter carriages on the London underground and similar transport systems would seem the ideal environment to spread COVID-19 and other winter bugs. However a new computer modelling simulatio… [+4482 chars]
